query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:TIME_SLICES:X.REQUEST_NAME:CODE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:TIME_SLICES:X.LAST_UPDATED_DATE:LAST_UPDATED_DATE@, @SELECT:DIM_PROP:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:TIME_SLICES:X.LAST_UPDATED_BY:LAST_UPDATED_BY@ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT pbs.request_name AS request_name, pbs.last_updated_date AS last_updated_date, csu.user_name AS last_updated_by FROM prj_blb_slicerequests pbs LEFT JOIN cmn_sec_users csu ON csu.id = pbs.last_updated_by WHERE pbs.is_visible = 1 AND pbs.is_template = 0 AND pbs.is_synchronous = 0 ) x WHERE @FILTER@
